metadata.title: MUK LUKS Women's Cuff Slipper
features: TREAT YOURSELF TO A NEW PAIR OF MUK LUKS: The Womens Terry Cuff Slipper Sock is the perfect addition to your closet to level up your cozy game this spring!
COMFORTABLE, FUNCTIONAL, DURABLE: Made of 100% acrylic, these slipper socks will stand the test of time. Stretchy enough to offer the perfect fit, and warm enough to keep your toes toasty all day.
ONE FOR ALL: Our stretchy slipper socks are one size fits most.
CARE AND CLEANING: To keep your socks in peak condition, machine wash cold. Do not bleach, and dry flat. Cleaning made simple!

MUK LUKS STORY: Here at Muk Luks we have been celebrating authentic style and innovative creativity since 1972. Cozy up and express yourself the Muk Luks way, with the freedom to mix-and-match and the confidence to show your individuality. Kick back, relax, and get your happy on!
description: The MUK LUKS Women's Cuffed Slipper Socks are going to be your new best friend. These soft and cozy knit slippers are perfect for keeping your toes warm no matter where your day takes you. PVC non skid dots will give you extra security on your way from your couch to the fridge, and the ribbed cuff ensures your socks don't slip off. Wipe clean with damp cloth and lay flat to dry for best results.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "13 x 10.1 x 4.7 inches; 1.8 Pounds", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "September 25, 2015", "Manufacturer": "MUK LUKS"}
